flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.introduction:
How to Fix DS Lite Broken Hinge & Replace Shell

Remember that this not an easy repair as it looks because this involves handling small screws and fragile stuff like the screen so you might not want to do it all yourself because you might mess thing up, So you can get it repaired at ds lite repair Shop .

Find cheap original Nintendo DS Lite hinge replacements or replacement shell Nintendo Repair Shop Inc, along with any other nintendo ds lite repair parts you may need.

You must check out the second part NDSL hinge repair tutorials, for any comments or any questions look at nintendo dsi hinges Repair . Thanks For Watching.

guide.summary: Step by step guide to repair the damaged hinges of the Nintendo DS Lite starting from disassembling the DS to repairing the broken hinges and then putting everything at its place again. It is perfect and easy to follow tutorial for newbies can do it.
guide.title: Fix DS Lite Broken Hinge & Replace Shell
